title: (x) dotted fonts - FF Dot Matrix, Little Dotties {Stephen, Claes}
content:
please help me in identify these dotted fonts...  
please also name me some similar commercial fonts if you know...  
its kinda urgent.

thanks a ton in advance  
satya,  
design student, india

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100629215211im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC08280_4188.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100629215211im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC08281_5062.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100629215211im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC08283_6600.JPG)
author: satya

comments.content: Two fonts here. The first is [FF Dot Matrix](http://web.archive.org/web/20100629215211/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.8502.2.8&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=1927-2002&sampleSize=48) by Cornel Windlin.

Similar fonts are Flek and Plek by [http://www.foundrytypes.co.uk/faces.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100629215211/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/faces.html "http://www.foundrytypes.co.uk/faces.html")

You can have a lot of fun with these ones.

the font in the third picture is "Little Dotties", which i made!

it's not very good and it has a limited character set, but it's (basically) free and downloadable [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20100629215211/http:/www.fuelfonts.com/archive/).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100629215211im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dotties_6638.png)
thanks claes..nice font..liked it a lot.
